info.title: Locations (Deprecated)
info.description: This endpoint has been deprecated and not receive any future updates. Please use the Financial Hierarchy v1 or v2 endpoint.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search string to find Locations. Searches against Site Name, Profit Center Name, Location Name

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of Site to return Locations.

parameters.name: profit_center
parameters.description: Unique ID of Profit Center to return Locations.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of Location to return a Location.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of data set to return

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of rows in each page to return.

parameters.name: bypass-cache
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

parameters.name: smoke
parameters.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP header variable will route the API call to the Integration testing environment.  Only applicable in QA.

count.description: Number of Records returned in request

size.description: Number of Records to return with result set

location_id.description: Unique code for a Profit Center, sourced by BIC or MDG

location.description: Unique code for a Profit Center, sourced by MDG

location_enabled.description: Indicator of whether Profit Center is enabled 'Y/N'

service_type.description: GL Code for services provided at locations

primary.description: Indicator for whether this is the primary location for Profit Center

profit_center.description: Unique code for a Profit Center, sourced by BIC or MDG

site_id.description: Site ID coming from source system CSP Will be deprecated once MDG application is fully implemented

site_no.description: Site No coming from source system CSP

site.description: Global Unique identifier coming from MDG system

create_date.description: Calendar date when Site was created

last_update_date.description: Calendar date when Site was last updated
